events.message: The policyholder reported a car collision that occurred on 28th April 2024 involving another vehicle at an intersection.
The claim was categorised under Auto Accident after reviewing the initial report and policy coverage details.
An insurance agent was assigned to handle the case and contact the claimant for further information.
The claimant received confirmation that the insurance company acknowledged receipt of the accident claim.
The agent requested the claimant to submit police reports, photographs of vehicle damage, and any witness statements.
The claimant submitted all requested documents including detailed photos and the official police report for review.
The claims investigation team began examining the submitted evidence to verify accident circumstances.
Investigation confirmed liability and extent of damages, clearing the way for settlement discussions.
A fair settlement offer was proposed to the claimant based on damage assessment and policy coverage limits.
The claimant responded positively to the proposed settlement and expressed satisfaction with the handling so far.
Claim approval was granted. All documentation and investigation results fulfilled the agreement criteria.
Payment for the settlement amount was issued promptly to the claimant's designated bank account.
The claim file was officially closed after the claimant confirmed receipt of payment and satisfaction with resolution.
All claim records and correspondence were archived in the system for future reference and compliance requirements.
